column5: A 40 ounce bottle of Jack is 34.85 Cdn funds......Wild Turkey is 24.85 per 26 oz......We also have J Beam white and black label, Gentelman Jack, Maker's Mark and Wild Turkey Barrel Proof.

The price has been up and down. You guys have got to stop shooting man....We're around .75Litre right now. Thats about $2.00 Us per US gallon. If you're that tight you might want to stay home.............

It is a special promotion the gas companies have put together in order to get people to come up to Toronto, go the theatre, maybe a Blue Jays game, restaurants and then they fill up their cars, and finally head back home to start spreading SARS around in their own neighbourhood. Canadian beer is not stronger than U.S. beer. Canada figures the alcohol content by volume (as does most of the world). The U.S. figures the alcohol content by weight. Since the specific gravity of alcohol is 0.792 (lighter than water), the approximate strength of a U.S. beer at 4.0% (by weight) is 5.0% (by volume). Go to www.realbeer.com; they have a listing of about a hundred beers and their alcohol content by volume. Most U.S. beers are as strong or stronger than Canadian beers.
They may not be stronger but they sure are better
How much can I expect to pay for a 750ML bottle of Jack Daniel's in Canada?? (Or is it the law I MUST drink Canadian Whiskey??)

MarkG:The web site address for the Liquor Control Board of Ontario (LCBO) is:http://www.lcbo.com/stores_products/index.htmlYou can do a product search for Jack Daniel's and you'll get a list of what Jack Daniel's products are available in Canada and their price. By the way, a 750 ml bottle of JACK DANIEL'S SOUR MASH is $25.95 Cdn
Fishhead50:Actually, my comment was of the "tongue in cheek" type. Regardless, your statement about the alcohol content of US and Cdn beer being the same is completely correct.
